Welcome to the Lost and Found App â€” a simple and reliable mobile application designed to help you report and recover lost or found items easily.

This app was developed as part of a group project with the goal of providing a centralized, user-friendly platform where anyone can share information about lost and found items in public areas, events, or daily environments.

With real-time listings, item image uploads, and local notification alerts, we aim to make the lost and found process faster, more efficient, and more accessible for everyone.

We believe that small actions can make a big difference, and returning lost items to their rightful owners is a great way to build a more responsible and caring community.

Thank you for using our app!
